title: 两个问题关于Automessage与jobs
author: 61叔叔
txt_content:
Automessage插件的问题就是只要我设置完config.yml的内容然后输入/am reload
config马上就会清空到只剩下作者的那些解释
Jobs插件的问题是我已经设置好了jobsconfig.yml文件,但是在服务器里面输入
/jobs join 职业名字
他仍然说没有这个职业

求大神帮助

automessage配置文件

#  ----------------------------------------------------
#  AutoMessage Configuration File
#  ----------------------------------------------------
#  Message Configuration:
#     Messages are handled in lists to allow for advanced customization!
#     Feel free to add color codes by using & in your messages!
#     To split a message onto multiple lines use the %n delimiter!
#     Lines starting with / will be run as a command!
#     To add single apostrophes into a message use ''.
#     For a complete tutorial go to http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/automessage.
#     If you are unfamiliar with YAML use the in-game commands: /am help

settings:
  enabled: true
  min-players: 0
  log-to-console: false
message-lists:
  regular:
    enabled: true
    random: true
    interval: 45
    expiry: -1
    prefix: '[&4&l风暴公告&r] '
    suffix: ''
    messages:
    - '&a请不要在服务器放置高空流水,高频红石等卡服设备': []
    - '&6如果觉得服务器好玩就多带点朋友来玩吧,服务器群:307398940': []
    - '&3新手怎么赚钱?输入/warp mob就可以去到怪物世界了哦': []
    - '&4如果你在服务器里发现了什么bug可以向腐竹上报哦': []
    - '&b服务器里允许玩家自由交易,手拿物品左击箱子输入定价就可以创建商店啦!': []
    - '&7不知道怎么去其他世界?输入/kit cd领取服务器快捷菜单,里面有许多功能哦': []        

  formatted:
    enabled: false
    random: false
    interval: 45
    expiry: -1
    prefix: ''
    suffix: ''
    messages:
    - '%6s %9s %10s':
      - 'Custom'
      - 'formatted'
      - '&2message!'





jobs配置文件(jobsconfig.yml):

# Jobs configuration.
# 
# Stores information about each job.
# 
# For example configurations, visit http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/jobs/.

Jobs:
  # must be one word
  Woodcutter:
    # full name of the job (displayed when browsing a job, used when joining and leaving)
    # also can be used as a prefix for the user's name if the option is enabled.
    # Shown as a prefix only when the user has 1 job.
    #
    # NOTE: Must be 1 word
    fullname: Woodcutter
    # Shortened version of the name of the job. Used as a prefix when the user has more 
    # than 1 job
    shortname: W
    description: Earns money felling and planting trees  
    # The colour of the name, for a full list of supported colours, go to the message config.
    ChatColour: GREEN
    # Option to let you choose what kind of prefix this job adds to your name.
    # options are: full, title, job, shortfull, shorttitle, shortjob and none
    chat-display: full
    # [OPTIONAL] - the maximum level of this class
    #max-level: 10
    # [OPTIONAL] - the maximum number of users on the server that can have this job at 
    # any one time (includes offline players).
    #slots: 1
    # Equation used for calculating how much experience is needed to go to the next level.
    # Available parameters:
    #   numjobs - the number of jobs the player has
    #   joblevel - the level the player has attained in the job.
    # NOTE: Please take care of the brackets when modifying this equation.
    leveling-progression-equation: 100*((1.13+(0.01*(numjobs-1)))^(joblevel-1))
    # Equation used for calculating how much income is given per action for the job level.
    # Available parameters:
    #   baseincome - the income for the action at level 1 (as set in the configuration).
    #   joblevel - the level the player has attained in the job.
    # NOTE: Please take care of the brackets when modifying this equation.
    income-progression-equation: baseincome*((1.05)^(joblevel-1))
     # Equation used for calculating how much experience is given per action for the job level.
    # Available parameters:
    #   baseexperience - the experience for the action at level 1 (as set in the configuration).
    #   joblevel - the level the player has attained in the job.
    # NOTE: Please take care of the brackets when modifying this equation.
    experience-progression-equation: baseexperience*((1.05)^(joblevel-1))
    ########################################################################
    # Section used to configure what items the job gets paid for, how much
    # they get paid and how much experience they gain.
    #
    # For break and place, the block name or id is used.
    # You can select a sub-type by using a '-' between the id and the bit
    # value for the sub-type. e.g LOG-0 = usual log, LOG-2 = birch log
    # 17-2 = birch log.
    #
    # If no sub-type is give, the payout will be for all sub-types.
    #
    # To get a list of all available block types, check the
    # bukkit JavaDocs for a complete list of block types
    # http://jd.bukkit.org/apidocs/org/bukkit/Material.html
    # 
    # For kill tags (Kill and custom-kill), the name is the name of the
    # mob.
    # Available mobs:
    #   Chicken
    #   Cow
    #   Pig
    #   Sheep
    #   Wolf
    #   Creeper
    #   Giant
    #   Skeleton
    #   Spider
    #   Zombie
    #   PigZombie
    #   Squid
    #   Ghast
    #   Player
    #   Slime
    #
    # NOTE: mob names are case sensitive.
    #
    # For custom-kill, it is the name of the job (also case sensitive).
    # 
    # NOTE: If a job has both the pay for killing a player and for killing a
    # specific class, they will get both payments.
    ########################################################################
    # payment for breaking a block
    Break:
      # block name/id (with optional sub-type)
      LOG:
        # base income
        income: 5.0
        # base experience
        experience: 5.0
    # payment for placing a block
    Place:
      SAPLING: 
        income: 1.0
        experience: 1.0
      WOOD: 
        income: 2.0
        experience: 2.0
    # killing a mob
    Kill:
      # mob name
      Player:
        # base income
        income: 7.5
        # base experience
        experience: 7.5
    # permissions granted for joining class
    permissions:
      # example node
      aaaaaatest.node:
        # true to give, false to revoke
        value: true
        # minimum level needed to grant permission.  Use 0 for all levels
        level: 0
      aaaaaatest.node2:
        value: true
        # Permission granted when reaching level 10
        level: 10
  Miner:
    fullname: 矿工
    shortname: 矿工
    description: 通过挖矿来赚钱.
    ChatColour: DARK_GRAY
    chat-display: full
    #max-level: 50
    #slots: 10
    leveling-progression-equation: 100*((1.13+(0.01*(numjobs-1)))^(joblevel-1))
    income-progression-equation: baseincome*((1.01)^(joblevel-1))
    experience-progression-equation: baseexperience*((1.05)^(joblevel-1))
    Break:
      STONE:
        income: 0.01
        experience: 1.0
      COAL_ORE:
        income: 0.3
        experience: 1.0
      GLOWING_REDSTONE_ORE:
        income: 0.3
        experience: 1.0
      IRON_ORE: 
        income: 0.3
        experience: 1.0
      GOLD_ORE:
        income: 0.3
        experience: 1.0
      LAPIS_ORE:
        income: 0.3
        experience: 1.0
      DIAMOND_ORE:
        income: 0.3
        experience: 1.0
      OBSIDIAN: 
        income: 0.3
        experience: 1.0
      MOSSY_COBBLESTONE:
        income: 0.3
        experience: 1.0
  Farmer:
    fullname: 农民
    shortname: 农民
    description: 通过收获庄稼来获得金钱.
    ChatColour: BLUE
    chat-display: full
    #max-level: 50
    #slots: 10
    leveling-progression-equation: 100*((1.13+(0.01*(numjobs-1)))^(joblevel-1))
    income-progression-equation: baseincome*((1.01)^(joblevel-1))
    experience-progression-equation: baseexperience*((1.05)^(joblevel-1))
    Break:
      CROPS-7:
        income: 0.6
        experience: 1.0
      SUGAR_CANE_BLOCK:
        income: 0.6
        experience: 1.0
  Hunter:
    fullname: 战士
    shortname: 战士
    description: 通过击杀怪物与动物获得金钱与经验.
    ChatColour: RED
    chat-display: full
    #max-level: 50
    #slots: 10
    leveling-progression-equation: 100*((1.13+(0.01*(numjobs-1)))^(joblevel-1))
    income-progression-equation: baseincome*((1.01)^(joblevel-1))
    experience-progression-equation: baseexperience*((1.05)^(joblevel-1))
    Kill:
      Chicken:
        income: 0.3
        experience: 0.5
      Cow:
        income: 0.3
        experience: 0.5
      Pig:
        income: 0.3
        experience: 0.5
      Sheep: 
        income: 0.3
        experience: 0.5
      Wolf: 
        income: 0.3
        experience: 0.5
      Creeper: 
        income: 0.3
        experience: 0.5
      Skeleton: 
        income: 0.3
        experience: 0.5
      Spider:
        income: 0.3
        experience: 0.5
      Zombie: 
        income: 0.3
        experience: 0.5

replies.author: BlackJocker
replies.txt_content:
AutoMessage要把编码换成ANSI 目测你在用UTF-8
jobs的我想也是类似（没用过。。) 不过可能直接不支持中文

问题一：你的automassage不能用/am reload 这个指令是重新配置config文件（清理掉换成原有的
所以嘞，弄好就要重启服务器。乱码或者无用请考虑字体转码
问题二：jobs好像不能用中文
{:10_512:}
YOURS
大豆逼
